authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt John R. Sweney

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O there's sunshine, blessed sunshine, newline When the peaceful happy moments roll. newline When Jesus shows His smiling face, newline There is sunshine in my soul.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is sunshine in my soul today, newline More glorious and bright newline Than glows in any earthly sky, newline For Jesus is my light.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is music in my soul today, newline A carol to my King; newline And Jesus, listening can hear newline The songs I cannot sing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There is springtime in my soul today, newline For when the Lord is near newline The dove of peace sings in my heart, newline The flow'rs of grace appear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There is gladness in my soul today, newline And hope and praise and love, newline For blessings which He gives me now, newline For joys "laid up" above.
